config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration is used in the journal() method to set the size threshold for the PersistentJournal. It is passed as a parameter when creating a new PersistentJournal object.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the journal() method is called, which depends on the logic of the application that determines when a new journal needs to be created.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The _journalSizeThreshold configuration option impacts the size at which a new journal file will be created. Setting a higher threshold may result in larger journal files and potentially more disk space usage, while setting a lower threshold may result in more frequent creation of smaller journal files.
